name.ja: Google Scholar ダークモード

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the appearance of Google Scholar to dark mode.
short.ja: Google Scholarの外観をダークモードに変更します。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
>Advantages
・The color will be easy on the eyes.
・It is less tiring to look at for a long time.

>To be implemented in the future　
・Switching between light mode and dark mode reflecting device settings

※This add-on is unofficial.

Let's develop it together.
https://github.com/EveSquare/google-scholar-darkmode-extension
long.ja:
>Advantages
・The color will be easy on the eyes.
・It is less tiring to look at for a long time.

>To be implemented in the future　
・Switching between light mode and dark mode reflecting device settings
